2.text: Combine the water with 2 cups (256 g) of flour in a mixing bowl.

3.text: Stir the mixture with a spatula until there are no lumps.

4.text: Work with the plaster within 10 minutes.

5.text: Let the plaster set for 48 hours.

6.text: Heat 2 to 3 cups (470 to 710 ml) of water to 100 °F (38 °C).

7.text: Mix 1 cup (240 ml) of water with 2 cups (470 ml) of school glue.

8.text: Work with the plaster within 15 minutes.

9.text: Let the plaster set for 48-72 hours.
